item.description: In order to bring peace to our lives and to listen to our intuition, its imperative that we learn how to listen within. These beginners meditations will help you get in touch with your internal wisdom and provide clarity to understanding how to recieve the answers you are looking for. Barb tremlett is creating a following of students that want to continue to grow in spirituality, understand more in metaphysics and how to use the universal energy to find the answers for a better life. Join us fo rthis 90 minute workshop and get started on your journey towards inner peace. Cost is $15 per student

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Beginners Meditation
